changes.change: Mouse Event is has been removed, following items deleted from the inventories :
- We didn't reset Broken Wing cause many of you still has them into inventories. Sell them to the NPC, don't lose any money :)
We will add new ways to get Chef Specialist Card & Titles in next days.
- Changed Onyx Wings style to Official-like.
- You can now use NosBazaar in channel 2-5.
- Family Dungeon has been deactivated until further notice.
- You will be able to join Rainbow Battle even if there's no enough people for team.
- You can now use pets and partners in Rainbow Battle.
- Fixed a bug where you couldn't get job level rewards of Chef Specialist Card.
- Fixed a visual bug on Incapacitated Buff.
- You can now sell Mouse Chest in NosBazaar.
- You can now sell Apprentice Chef Title to the NPC.
- Added Dye Bomb in Rainbow Battle Exchange NPC.
- Added Lightning Wings in Rainbow Battle Exchange NPC.
- Added Rainbow Pegasus pet in Rainbow Battle Exchange NPC.
- Changed buff of Rainbow Master Title
After thinking this through for a long time, we have decided that it is the best for our server to nerf rewards from fishing.
- We are decreasing the chance of receiving Tattoo Box 1.
This has been a hard decision to make but ultimately it had to be done for many reasons.
1. Fishing was designed to be a side hustle, not a primary way of making money on Void
2. Big Problem with Botters destroying the market
3. Bringing more value and relevancy to World Boss
We do understand that some people can't make it to the World boss for those valuable materials and we assure you that fishing will still be a viable option for you !

- Master Bunny Pet : The probability of catching a fish is increased by 5% => The probability of catching a fish is increased by 10%. There's a 10% chance of catching a bigger fish => There's a 15% chance of catching a bigger fish.

- Shadow Master Bunny Pet : The probability of catching a fish is increased by 10% => The probability of catching a fish is increased by 20%. There's a 20% chance of catching a bigger fish => There's a 30% chance of catching a bigger fish. There's 50% chance to not consume a fish bait => There's 60% chance to not consume a fish bait. The fishing experience points you receive are increased by 10% => The fishing experience points you receive are increased by 20%. Added: Gold Received by selling fish at npc is increased by 15%.
